activities: Receive or collect, from time to time, some personal information from our employees and a small percentage of customers. Information may include personal contact information of customers and telephone numbers,address date of birth, sometimes social security numbers, personal residence addresses, etc. of employees.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human Resources data processed manually and electronically, a small percentage of customer and supplier processed manually and electronically
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
